edu.umass.cs.msocket.proxy.forwarder

Class ProxyMSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.net.Socket
      • edu.umass.cs.msocket.proxy.forwarder.ProxyMSocket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class ProxyMSocket
extends Socket
    Proxy creates a ProxyMSocket to setup the connection and forward the setup control messages between the server and the client, during the connection establishment phase. It is only used in the connection estb phase, not in data transfer phase
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Emmanuel Cecchet
